Player History
Was selected to the 1967 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1967, winning 2 games with a 1.06 ERA...
Injured on 4/4/1969 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/17/1972, winning 2 games with a 1.59 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1973, going 4-0, 1.24...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/1/1975 to a 2-year deal worth $2,345,000 per year...
Injured on 7/28/1975 with a Torn Ligament Elbow, out for full season...
Drafted in 4th round, 67th overall pick, by Detroit in 1978...
Injured on 5/25/1979 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
